turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I need to I need to order a Starbucks coffee drink in Palmdale, California near the airport.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it and what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: a grande caramel Frappuccino with extra whipped cream and whole milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: any syrups or add ons? Like whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: just a caramel served with cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So that's a grande whole milk cappuccino with caramel syrup and whipped cream from the starbucks inside the palmdale airport.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your drink is all set and will be ready for pickup in 15 minutes, the reciept will arrive via mobile.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, have a great day, bye.
